TopicTitle: I'm getting a lot of crashes, could use some help.

Articles.Content:
I highly doubt it's a memory issue, because I remember when I used to run twice as many mods than I do right now.

 

Here is my list of mods:

000_FilterExtensions

000_Toolbar

ActiveTextureManagement [Aggressive]

BahaSP

Chatterer

Community Resource Pack

Community Tech Tree

CrossFeedEnabler

DMagicOrbitalScience

FASA (Some parts deleted)

InterstellarFuelSwitch

JSI

Kerbal Alarm Clock

Kerbal Engineer

Kerbal Joint Reinforcement

Near Future Electrical

Near Future Propulsion

RCS Sounds

Remote tech

TweakScale

WarpPlugin

Modulemanager 2.6.13.dlll

Module Manager.ConfigCache

ModuleManager.ConfigSHA

ModuleManager.Physics

ModuleManager.TechTree

 

I know this a rather large list, but I didn't want to leave anything out. I did have many more mods but I deleted them, they did nothing to reduce or increase the frequency of the crashes.

I had a similar problem when I went from 1.0.4 to 1.0.5.

Check your graphics settings and turn off the water effects. This will reduce the memory taken by the game during loading. I also dropped my texture level to medium rather than High. Both of these gave me an extra Gig rather than barely allowing 1 flight.

Regards Brad

On 24/12/2015 at 6:09 PM, LostElement said:

I highly doubt it's a memory issue.

Doubt is fine, but the logs will tell you for sure.

The is what the error log says:

 Error occurred at 2015-12-24_100132.
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program\KSP.exe, run by Nikolai.
77% memory in use.
0 MB physical memory [1712 MB free].
0 MB paging file [1628 MB free].
0 MB user address space [81 MB free].
Write to location 00400000 caused an access violation.

 

Not exactly sure what's up here...
